answers.answer: ...can sometimes be bells palsy. It affects a lot of pregnant women.
Is your blood pressure ok.u may wana call ur doc.
I had this happen to me and turns out i had an allergic reaction to something i ate! But i would go see your dr. Best of luck

My blood pressure has been a borderline 142/86, so they've been watching for pre eclmapsia. The numbness and tingling is mostly around my mouth and eye. I called and they said it's not normal, and asked me to come in tomorrow. They didn't seem alarmed, just want to check me to be cautious.
I have the same thing and it's bells palsy if Ur blood pressure good

A few times I had something like this happen to me. First I saw floaters then my nose, tounge and throat went numb and my left hand.. then I got a terrible head ache. I found out I was experiencing migraines for the first time in my life. I was about 31 weeks. But you need to go in they made me go in and did a blood test for preeclampsia.  But I didn't have it

Im 31 weeks.pregnant and I just experienced this Tuesday and come to find out its bell palsy my obgyn prescribed me steroids and want to see me in a week to see how things are... hope everything be ok for you and baby...

Thank you all for the answers. When I looked it up I saw several say bells palsy. It has only happened today and it was for 2 hours or so. It wasn't super strong, but enough I was noticing it. I'm hoping it was just a fluke and nothing is wrong. Next week I have my ultrasound to check baby boys kidney and see if it is still dilated. Here's to hoping for some good news over the next week!

question: The left side of my face is tingling and slightly numb, it is similar to the feeling you get after the dentist when the numbing is wearing off. My doctors nurse said she doesn't think it's normal and wants me to come in tomorrow afternoon. I'm 29 weeks, and just want your opinions on what it might be. I have also had a headache most the week on and off.
title: Face tingling and numb
